name: Refrega
description:
Welcome to the world of "Refrega", a thrilling game that blends clever tactics, base building, and intense territorial conflicts. In this real-time strategy game with a top-down view, you take command of your troops, vying for supremacy on a vast battlefield.



Get ready for a challenge where the art of war merges with base engineering. Your strategic skills will be put to the test as you construct imposing bases and defend your territory against adversaries hungry for conquest.



Build your base wisely, developing infrastructures and impenetrable defenses. Every decision matters as you balance the development of your facilities with preparation for enemy attacks. Strategy is the key, and the top-down view allows you to plan each move with a global perspective of the battlefield.

The action heats up when the shooting begins. Lead your units in strategic battles, employ surprising tactics to outsmart your opponents. Base defenses will be put to the test, and only the most cunning and resilient will manage to keep their fortresses intact.



Seize territory and expand. Territorial conquest is not just an option but a necessity for those seeking supreme glory.

In "Refrega", every match is an opportunity to showcase your tactical mastery. Be ready to make quick decisions, adapt your strategy, and emerge victorious in a world where the battle for supremacy never ceases. The playing field is set. The question is: Do you have what it takes to dominate?
